name: meatballs in space
description:
You fight ever growing waves of hazardous meatballs in space. From time to time you'll see crates flowing through space; they provide upgrades if you shoot them. Some are temporary, some permanent.

You can unlock several characters to play as.

  • Potato
  • Suply crate
  • Meatball
  • Pistol

// This is my first finished game project to see the light of day. I've worked on //different ideas and prototypes for about 6 or 7 years, and didn't finish a single
//one of them. This projects only purpous was to finish a game. Its not the
//prettiest  game, but it's finished :)

//Hope some of you are having fun with it! :)
